item.description:
“Venture Capital: An Insider's View” Panel Discussion  When:              Thursday, March 10, from 6:00 p.m. - 9:00 pm Where:             IBM Center for Social Software · 1 Rogers Street · Cambridge
Organized by:   Women Entrepreneurs in Science and Technology Website:           http://www.westorg.org/mc/page.do?sitePageId=124340 Venture Capital is an essential source of funding for early-stage science & technology start-ups. This panel of successful VC experts will discuss key elements they look for in prospective companies, the best way to pitch ideas to potential investors, and career paths related to investing in start-ups. There will be ample time for questions from the audience. Whether you're thinking of funding your own start-up or simply want a rare insider's look, come learn from the panelist's experience. Speakers include:   ·         Janice Bourque, Managing Director, Hercules Technology Growth Capital ·         Maggie Le Flore, Venture Partner, MedImmune Ventures ·         Irena Melnikova, Director of Scouting and Partnering, Sanofi-Aventis ·         Ellen Rubin, Founder & VP Products, CloudSwitch This event is open to the public, everyone is welcome to attend! Refreshments are included!
item.name: “Venture Capital: An Insider's View” Panel Discussion
